hero.title: Welcome to AI-Server Control Center
hero.description: Manage n8n / Dify / OneAPI / RagFlow and more in one place. Check status, performance, and logs easily.

slides.workflowDesc: Use n8n templates to build notification, reporting, and monitoring flows quickly.
slides.marketDesc: From support assistants to doc Q&A, set up your AI scenario in minutes.

dify.description: AI application and workflow development platform

oneapi.description: Unified AI API gateway and quota management

ragflow.description: RAG knowledge base QA and document retrieval system

docker.title: Docker
docker.statusRunning: Docker is running. You can manage and monitor containers.
docker.statusStoppedCanStart: Docker is not running. You can try to start Docker Desktop from the right button.
docker.statusNotInstalled: Docker does not seem to be installed. Please install Docker Desktop first.

errors.stopModuleFailed: Failed to stop module. Please check Docker.
errors.startModuleFailed: Failed to start module. Please check Docker.
errors.dockerStartFailed: Failed to start Docker service. Please start Docker Desktop manually.
errors.dockerNotInstalled: Docker does not seem to be installed correctly. Please install Docker Desktop first.
errors.dockerTimeout: Docker startup timed out. Please verify Docker Desktop status.
errors.dockerStatusCheckFailed: Failed to check Docker status. Please verify Docker Desktop is running.
